title: Always In My Head
lyrics:
I think of you
I haven't slept
I think I do
But I don't forget
My body moves
Goes where I will

But though I try my heart stays still

It never moves

Just won't be led

So my mouth waters to be fed

And you're always in my head

You're always in my head

You're always in my head

You're always in my head



You're always in my head

Always in my...

You're always in my...



This I guess is to tell you you're chosen out from the rest
